college: Bangalore Medical College and Research Institute, Bangalore
college.1: POSTGRADUATE INSTITUTE OF MEDICAL  EDUCATION AND RESEARCH, CHANDIGARH
summary: Dr. Jai Babu serves as an accomplished independent consultant, specializing in a wide array of diagnostic and interventional procedures. His expertise encompasses complex coronary angioplasties, challenging bifurcation lesions, intricate left main interventions, primary percutaneous coronary interventions (PCI), balloon valvotomies, pacemaker implantations, as well as ASD, VSD, and PDA device closures. He also demonstrates proficiency in radial angioplasties. With an impressive 18 years of comprehensive clinical experience, including 5 years dedicated to specialization, Dr. Jai Babu stands as a seasoned practitioner in the medical field.  Dr. Babu's educational background is equally noteworthy. He completed his MBBS degree at Bangalore Medical College and Research Institute in 2003. Following this, he achieved his MD in Medicine from the prestigious Postgraduate Institute of Medical Education and Research in Chandigarh in 2008. His commitment to learning and growth led him to work as a Senior Resident in the Department of Internal Medicine at Jawaharlal Institute of Postgraduate Medical Education & Research in 2009. Continuing his pursuit of excellence, he successfully attained his DM in Cardiology from Sri Jayadeva Institute of Cardiovascular Sciences and Research in Bangalore in 2015. This extensive academic journey has not only honed his skills but also enriched his clinical acumen.

college: Karnataka Medical College, Hubli
summary: Dr. Srinivas V K is a Cardiologist in Vydehi Superspeciality Hospital with 35 years of clinical experience working as head of Interventional Cardiology at Vydehi Superspeciality Hospital formerly Mallya Hospital. He was a Professor of Cardiology in Vydehi Institute of Medical Sciences. Dr.V.K.Srinivas is a renowned Cardiologist with extensive experience in many percutaneous coronary intervention, pacemaker implantation, peripheral intervention and non invasive diagnostic procedures.   He has been pioneer in primary Angioplasty procedures doing Angioplasty treatment for heart attack patients. He has done over 25,000 Cardiac Catheterizations till now, 10,000 Angioplasties. Worked as Cardiologist of St.Marthas Hospital / P.D Hinduja Sindhi Hospital, Bangalore. He is a life member of CSI and fellow of Society of Cardiac Angiography & Interventions.

summary: Dr Jayaranganatha M. works as a Consultant Cardiologist at Manipal Hospital(Bangalore).He has 23 years of experience in Adult and Paediatric Cardiology with special interest in treating diagnosis and management of paediatric cardiac diseases.Dr Jayaranganatha has acquired his MBBS degree from Bangalore Medical College, Bangalore University.Dr Jayaranganatha is Doctor of Medicine in Cardiology from Grant Medical College Bombay University, Mumbai. He was previously practicing at Manipal Heart Foundation and Wockhardt Hospital in Bangalore. Dr Jayaranganatha was also Assistant Professor at M.S. Ramaiah Institute of Cardiology and Sri Jayadeva Institute of Cardiology, Bangalore. He has presented over 30 papers on Cardiology in National and International Conferences. Dr Jayaranganatha is a member at Association in the Paediatric Cardiac Society of India and Indian College of Cardiology.

college: Bangalore Medical College and Research Institute, Bangalore
summary: Dr. CM Nagesh is Associate Professor of Cardiology at Sri Jayadeva Institute of Cardiovascular Sciences and Research in Bangalore. He also practises as a Consultant Interventional Cardiologist at Apollo Hospital, and Cardea Clinic in Bangalore.  Dr. Nagesh completed his MBBS with a first class and four gold medals from Bangalore University in 1998. He then obtained an MD in General Medicine through Rajasthan University, in 2004. In 2008 he added the DM (Cardiology) degree to his qualifications, studying at All India Institute of Medical Sciences, New Delhi and has also served at this Institute as a Senior Research Officer (Cardiology) for 6 months.  Dr. CM Nagesh functions as an independent consultant doing diagnostic and interventional procedures including complex coronary angioplasties, CTO, bifurcation lesions, left main interventions, primary PCI, balloon valvotomies, pacemaker implantations, ASD, VSD and PDA device closures, and radial angioplasties. He is actively pursuing endovascular work such as venous interventions, peripheral arterial and aortic interventions. His main area of interest lies in Interventional Cardiology, mainly complex coronary interventions such as left main angioplasties, CTO and bifurcation lesions, and peripheral Interventions.  Dr. Nagesh has many publications to his name and has also presented his papers at national and international conferences, picking up several awards along the way. He has actively participated in many national conferences and held in organising some of them.

college: Stanley Medical College & Hospital , Chennai
summary: Dr. K P Srihari Das is a Senior Interventional Cardiologist currently Practising at Columbia Asia Hospital (Sarjapur Road) Bangalore and has an experience of 29 years.He was earlier associated with Sagar Hospital(Jayanagar),St.Philomena`s hospital  & Narayana Multispeciality hospital (HSR Layout). Dr.Srihari Das practices at Dr K P Srihari Das Clinic in Jayanagar 9 Block, Bangalore.  He completed MBBS from Stanley Medical College & Hospital , Chennai in 1988,MD - General Medicine from Stanley Medical College, Chennai in 1997 and DM - Cardiology from Madras Medical College, Chennai in 2004.

summary: He is an expert in Transracial coronary interventions. He has rendered valuable service in many reputed hospitals across Bangalore .besides being affiliate of many medical associations, he was a member of faculty at M S .Ramaiah medical college and Dr. B R Ambedkar Medical college, Bangalore. He is a member of the national academy of medical sciences, Indian medical association, Indian college of cardiology , cardiology society of India and an international fellow of the European college of cardiology. He completed his MBBS from Bangalore medical college, Bangalore and pursed his post-graduation in internal medicine from government medical college, Mysore and was conferred MD in general medicine by Rajiv Gandhi university of health sciences.  He did his cardiology training at Wockhardt Hospital, Bangalore and acquired his DNB in cardiology certification from the national board of examinations, New Delhi. He was a consultant cardiologist at CSI hospital, Fortis Hospital Cunningham Road and Narayana Multispecialty Hospital Whitefield. He has undergone specialized training in complex coronary interventions, rot ablation, IVUS, FFR, OCT and pacemaker implantation at Asan medical Centre, Seoul, Korea, Cleveland clinic USA and Mount Sinai Hospital New York, USA.

college: Mysore University
summary: Scaling heights of success with hard work and dedication and leaving a mark of excellence on each decision, Dr. Venkatesulu has a rich experience of 24 years in patient treatment and medical services. He is proficient in providing emergency treatment and performing a history and physical examination and coordinating with a diverse range of departments, professionals, and programs through a complete understanding of the healthcare arena and integrated networks.  Dr. Venkatesulu is experienced in managing complete medical and administration involving technical, administrative and manpower (medical and non-medical) management. He has extensive knowledge of the information and techniques needed to diagnose and treat human injuries, diseases, and deformities - this includes symptoms, treatment alternatives, drug properties and interactions, and preventive health-care measures. He consults with specialists and medical professionals about patient care and treatment and instructs what care is to be given after an operation by nursing and medical staff.  Dr. Venkatesulu has rich experience in OPD management, has organized health camps and lead health marketing across corporate hospital segments. He is involved in prescribing or administering treatment, therapy, medication, vaccination and other specialized medical care to prevent illness, disease or injury and is skilled in planning and implementing health programs in hospitals for prevention or treatment of injury or illness. He has strong experience in all aspects of hospital management including manpower planning, selection, facilities administration, cross-divisional coordination and liaison with external bodies for smooth running of the hospital and patient care services. From 2003 to the present, Dr. Venkatesulu has worked in various capacities in well-known institutions. He has a DM (Cardiology) from Ramchandra University, General Medicine from Mysore University, Bangalore and MBBS (Medicine) from Mysore University, Bangalore.

college: BMC
summary: Dr. Kumar is a Consultant Interventional Cardiologist at SPARSH Hospitals, Bangalore and Bangalore Diabetes Centre ( BDC) Kalyan Nagar. He has completed his undergraduate training from Bangalore Medical College. He went on to obtain MD in Internal Medicine from JIPMER, Pondicherry, which is an institute of national importance. He has been trained to the perfection in the field of intervention cardiology at one of the nation’s esteemed institute i.e. CMC Vellore. He has nearly 14 years of experience in the field of cardiac science. And, before joining SPARSH Hospitals, he has rendered his service at CMC Vellore and Gleneagles Global Hospitals, Bangalore. Dr. Kumar who is a highly skilled interventionist has an experience of over 2000 coronary interventions including primary angioplasty and complex coronary interventions like bifurcations, chronic total occlusions, graft angioplasties etc. He also has vast experience in peripheral artery interventions. He routinely performs device closures for congenital heart diseases such as ASD, VSD and PDA. Additionally, he is also highly skilled in the implantation of permanent pacemakers and ICDs.  Dr. Kumar comes from a noticeable academic background and has many publications in reputed international and national journals to his credit. His focus is in primary prevention of cardiovascular diseases and he strives hard to reduce the cardiovascular disease burden in the society by conducting regular community-based teaching programs. He believes in evidence-based medicine and always follows patient centric and guidelines-based treatment in the management of his patients.

college: Adichunchanagiri Institute of Medical Sciences Bellur
summary: Dr. Pradeep Haranahalli is one of the leading Cardiologists in Whitefield and Kadugodi areas in Bangalore. He completed MBBS from Adichunchanagiri Institute of Medical Sciences Bellur, MD - Internal Medicine from Rajasthan University of health sciences Jaipur and DM - Cardiology from LPS Institute of Cardiology, GSVM Medical College Kanpur.  Prior to his practice in Bangalore, he was working at Fortis Escorts Heart Institute, erstwhile Escorts Heart Institute, New Delhi. He has over 17 years of experience in the field of Medicine and Cardiology with specialised training in Cardiac Interventions. He has gained vast experience with all kinds of Complex Coronary and Non-Coronary interventions over these years with thousands of successful procedures done. He is an expert in Complex Coronary Interventions requiring assistive devices and imaging like Rotablation, Protection devices, IVUS guided PCI, Bypass Graft Interventions, Impella, IABP support and has performed hundreds of such procedures till date.  He is available round the clock for cardiac emergencies and routinely performs Primary Angioplasty as an emergency procedure in patients with Heart Attack and has performed numerous such procedures in Delhi-NCR area. He has traveled extensively in Northern India to places like Dehradun, Jabalpur, Raipur for performing procedures in the past six years of his work.  He also performs procedures like Peripheral Angioplasty, Carotid Angioplasty, Renal Angioplasty and Balloon Mitral Commisurotomy, Aortic Valvuloplasty, Alcohol septal ablation, LA Appendage Closure. He is also routinely in to various other procedures like Adult congenital and structural heart disease interventions, Permanent pacemaker implantation, AICD implantation, CRT implantation and Cardiac Emergency Interventions like Primary Angioplasty, Pericardial Aspiration, Pulmonary Embolism Interventions.  He has obtained specialised training in complex coronary interventions and CTO lesions (Total 100% blockages) from Mount Sinai Heart, New York and Toyohashi Heart Center, Japan. His area of interest is treatment of total blockages which may avert the need for bypass surgery. He is trained in LA Appendage Occlusion at Cliniques Universitaires Saint-Luc, Brussels and University Hospitals, Luven, Belgium. He has Authored several Articles and Book Chapters in Various National and International Publications.

He has vast experience in the field of Centennial Cardiology He has done more than 7000 Angiograms and 1500 PTCA’s.

summary: Dr. B Ramesh was a Professor of Cardiology in Sri Jayadeva institute of Cardiology, Bangalore. He joined this institute in 1987 as a registrar in DM Cardiology, completed DM in 1989, became Assistant Professor in 1990, and Professor in 1995, he retired in 2016.He trains DM cardiology fellows from all over India. He is one of the pioneering Interventional Cardiologist from Bangalore having performed thousands of Angioplasties, Balloon mitral Valvuloplasties, pacemaker implantations in his long career of more than 29 years. He has joined as professor & head of the department of Cardiology, Coordinator for DNB cardiology course, and consultant cardiologist at Apollo Hospital, B.G Road, Bangalore. He has started his own Ramesh Cardiology Clinic in Banashankari 2nd stage, in 2011 with state of the art facilities for diagnosis and management of cardiac ailments.

college: Jagadguru Jayadeva Murugarajendra Medical College (JJMMC)
summary: Dr. N. Praveen Kumar was born in Bangalore India. After graduation, he completed his M. D General Medicine from Sri Devaraj URS Medical College Kolar, Karnataka, India in 2009. He then worked in the dept of cardiology in Columbia Asia, Bangalore. He later completed his fellowship in noninvasive cardiology from Bhagwan Mahaveer Jain Hospital, Bangalore. Post Graduation he started working as a consultant cardiologist in BMJH. Presently he is the assistant professor at Sridevi Medical College Tumkur. He started Samiksha Heart And Diabetic Care in the year 2013 to provide cardiac services in Yelahanka, Bangalore.  Presently he is the visiting cardiologist for all the major hospitals in and around Yelahanka. Dr. Praveen has a clinical interest in preventive cardiology, lipid disorders, and cardiac imaging. He is known for the diagnosis of both common and rare, complex cardiac disorders. He has obtained certified degrees in diabetology and advanced hypertension management. His goal is to maintain the old-fashioned physician/patient relationship while applying the most advanced technology for diagnosis and treatment of cardiac and diabetic disorders.

summary: Dr.Devananda N.S is a renowned Cardiovascular and Thoracic Surgeon currently associated with Manipal Hospital (Bangalore). Over the past years he has performed more than 7000 Paediatric and Adult Surgeries. He has the reputation of successfully performing many advanced and complex surgeries varying from 1 day old infant to infant weighing just 900 gms to a 90 year old patient. He also has the credit of successfully removing a PNET tumor from the heart. Dr. Devananda's expertise lies in performing Aortic Aneurysm Surgery, Complex Valve Surgery and Repair, Minimally Invasive Cardiac Surgery, Beating Heart CABG, Neonatal/Infant/Paediatric Cardiac Surgery,Heart Transplants and Ventricular Assist Devices. He has been awarded the Rotary Centenary Award for Vocational excellence. He has published 12 papers in national and international journals. His approach lies in treating patients as his family-which means many patients notice a substantial difference in their symptoms almost immediately after their procedures.

summary: Dr. Karthik Vasudevan is currently a Senior Consultant in Interventional Cardiology at Manipal Hispital Yeshwanthpur, Bangalore. After graduation from the prestigious Bangalore Medical College, he pursued post-graduate medical degree in Internal Medicine (MD) from the same institute. Having worked as a Registrar in Cardiology, Wockhardt Heart Hospital, Bangalore, for a period of one year, he completed doctorate (DM) degree from the most sought after institute, Sri Jayadeva Institute of Cardiology, Bangalore in 2003. The following year, he was appointed as a Consultant in the department of Cardiology, Bhagawan Mahaveer Jain Heart Center, Bangalore, and simultaneously held the post of Honorary Associate Professor of Cardiology at Sri Devaraj Urs Medical College, Kolar. He has special interest in managing heart attack and heart failure patients.  He was trained in heart failure device implantation in Switzerland. He also worked at San Raffle Hospital, Milan, Italy and San Giovanni Battista Hospital, Torino, Italy, where he was trained in complex coronary interventions.  He is a regular faculty in many national and international conferences. He is a Fellow of Indian College of Cardiology and also a Fellow of the Society of Cardiovascular Angiography and Interventions (USA).  He is a diligent and accomplished Interventional Cardiologist, who has many research papers and clinical trials to his credit.

college: University Of Mysore, India
summary: Dr. Nagesh H E is an eminent interventional Cardiologist who has more than 6 years of experience in his current field. He specialises in Primary coronary Angioplasty and Elective Angioplasty. He treats both stable coronary artery disease patients or acute heart attack patients. He has performed numerous pacemaker implantation surgeries.Backed by his brilliant skills and experience, he has proved himself as a dedicated surgeon offering impetus to heart attack patients. Depending on the criticality of the situation and the window period, he decides between Cardiac angioplasty and Thrombolysis. He is very methodical in his approach and reachable to his patients for any emergency. Dr. Nagesh has hands-on experience in performing cardiac resynchronisation therapy which involves treating birth defects in the heart  like holes, blueberry syndrome. He also practises Electrophysiology which involves treatment of very slow and very fast heart rates seen in some individuals with the help of special devices.

college: Dr B R Ambedkar medical college
college.1: POSTGRADUATE INSTITUTE OF MEDICAL  EDUCATION AND RESEARCH, CHANDIGARH
summary: Dr. S Venkatesh is the Lead Interventional Cardiologist at Aster RV Hospital JP Nagar, Bengaluru. While Dr. Venkatesh is proficient in Coronary, Valvular, Peripheral & other interventional procedures in the Cardiac Cathlab, he is equally involved in preventive cardiology practice.  Qualifications & Previous Workplaces:  After completing his MBBS from Dr. B R Ambedkar Medical College, Bangalore in 1992, Dr. S Venkatesh went on to complete his 3-year MD in Internal Medicine from the prestigious PGIMER at Chandigarh where he was the batch topper & and won the First Order Medal. He completed his 3-year DM in Cardiology from PGIMER, Chandigarh in 2001.  Formerly Dr. Venkatesh was the Unit Chief of Cardiology & Assistant Professor at Kasturba Medical College, Mangalore, where he successfully set up the in-house interventional cardiology program from the ground up.  He subsequently worked in Wockhardt hospitals & later as  Senior Interventional Cardiologist & Head, Department of Cardiology at Fortis Hospital Bannerghatta.  Languages Spoken: Kannada, English, Telugu, Tamil, Hindi  Career accomplishments Dr. S Venkatesh has nearly 15,000 diagnostic catheterizations and more than 3500 interventional procedures in the catheterization laboratory. He is proficient in diagnostic coronary, peripheral, cerebral & congenital catheterizations.  His areas of expertise are:  Coronary Interventions including Primary & Complex Coronary angioplasty such as Left Main Coronary artery, coronary bifurcations, chronic total occlusions, Rotablator-stenting and angioplasty to coronary bypass grafts, Intravascular Ultrasound (IVUS) & FFR supported angioplasty.  Percutaneous Valve Replacement (TAVI/TMVR): Patients who require Aortic valve replacement surgery but are not fit for open heart surgery benefit from Percutaneous or Non-surgical valve replacement. Dr Venkatesh has successfully set up  the Transcatheter Aortic Valve Replacement (TAVI or TAVR) program in Aster RV hospital. He is credited with the first combined TAVI with Rota-stenting procedure in Karnataka state. He also performed the first valve-in-valve TAVI in Karnataka state and the second valve-in-valve Transcatheter Mitral Valve Replacement (TMVR) procedure in Bangalore city.   Among valvular interventions, he has successfully performed percutaneous mitral, Aortic & pulmonary valvuloplasties. He has the credit for performing the First Transcatheter Aortic Valve Replacement (TAVI or TAVR) at Fortis Hospital Bannerghatta Road, Bangalore.  Aortic Aneurysms & Dissections: Dr. S Venkatesh has performed numerous percutaneous and hybrid repairs of thoracic aortic aneurysms & dissections (TEVAR) and done Aortic Stent Grafting for Abdominal Aorta Aneurysms (EVAR for AAA). He is also proficient in peripheral interventions including Carotid, Renal, Subclavian, Pulmonary, Innominate, Iliac & Femoral artery angioplasty & stenting.  He is an expert in handling pediatric diagnostic & interventional procedures and has accomplished various ASD & PDA device closures. Dr. S Venkatesh is experienced in implanting Single & Dual Chamber pacemakers, ICDs & Biventricular pacemakers.  Dr. S Venkatesh is known for his passion for Preventive Cardiology. He is an expert in the medical management of Ischemic Heart disease, Congestive Heart Failure, Hypertension, Various cardiac issues in Diabetic & kidney patients.

summary: Dr. Nagamalesh U M is an Interventional Cardiologist and a Transplant Cardiologist with over 2 decades of experience, and highly experienced in handling cases involving Advanced Heart Failure, Heart Transplant, and Interventional Cardiology.  He has conducted over 54 heart transplants, with internationally acceptable outcomes and has performed over 30,000 cardiac catheterisations, coronary angiographies, pacemaker implants, and coronary angioplasties. His area of expertise includes primary angioplasty, bifurcation lesions, left main and vein graft intervention, using both the radial and femoral approach. He is also proficient in techniques such as FFR, ROTA, valvular heart disease, ASD, PDA closures device pacemaker, and ICD implantation.  Dr. Nagamalesh obtained a Bachelor’s in Medicine and Surgery from the JSS Medical College in Mysore and has a Master’s in Medicine from the prestigious Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences, Bengaluru. He has a Diplomate from the National Board (Cardiology) and has also received training in heart failure and transplant cardiology from Papworth Hospital in Cambridge, UK.  Dr. Nagamalesh has written articles for various publications. To his long list of achievements, he has also been a recipient of the Chairman’s Award by Dr Devi Prasad Shetty from Narayana Health. He was given the Distinguished Alumni Award for his outstanding performance in developing the Heart Transplant Programme in Karnataka.

summary: Dr. Ashwin M Daware is an Interventional Cardiologist with 13 years of experience in the field of cardiology, presently working as consultant interventional cardiologist at Sky Medical Corporation Whitefield Bangalore.  Dr Ashwin  is the chief cardiologist and founder of sky medical corporation.  He has rich experience of 13 yeqars in the field of cardiology. At present he is affiliated to Manipal Hospitals Whitefield , Columbia Asia Hiospitals Whitefield And Sakra World Hospital. Previously he was working as interventional cardiologist at Narayana Hrudayalaya hospitals at Whitefield.  Before he relocated to bangalore in 2013 he was working in Maharashtara with Fortis and Wockhardt Hospitals as interventional cardiologist.  Having trained in Cardiology from some of the prime institutes in the country, Dr Ashwin has an immense experience in the field and is also well capable of handling cardiac emergencies.  Dr Ashwin is a committed and self-directed individual, always willing to help his patients during emergencies and challenges. His patients find him approachable and empathetic.  Dr Ashwin believes in shared decision making in complex problems of cardiovascular medicine where the opinion and values of family members also play a crucial role in healing.  Dr Ashwin has received immense exposure in Cardiology and is well versed in diagnosing and treating various cardiac emergencies. He has immense knowledge regarding Temp Pacemakers, Intubations, Cardiac Catheterizations, Acute heart failure etc.  He is also well versed in handling Radial Coronary Angiography, Pulmonary Angiography, Renal Angiography, Multivessel Stenting, Bifurcation Stenting and Cardiac Imaging. He believes in making use of the good and novel techniques of treatment like Cardiovascular MR, Coronary CTA, and Advanced Interventional Cardiology.  Dr Ashwin completed his MBBS in the year 2001 from Amravati University. In the year 2004, he completed his MD in General Medicine from RST Nagpur. He has done his DNB in Cardiology and is a Fellow of the National Academy of Medical Sciences, New Delhi.  Dr Ashwin has worked with the greatest hospitals in India. He has worked at Wockhardt Hospitals, Nagpur as a Consultant Cardiologist. He has also proven his expertise in other hospitals like Care Hospital, Hyderabad, GMCH Nagpur and also the Fortis Arneja Heart Institute, Nagpur.

summary: Dr. Davinder Singh Chadha  has Over 3 decades of experience in Armed Force Medical Services.  	Twenty one Years dedicated to Interventional Cardiology with extensive work exposure to complex Coronary Interventions, device implantations & structural heart interventions.    	Appointed Professor of Cardiology by Maharashtra University of Health Sciences (MUHS, Nasik). Recognized DM & DNB cardiology Examiner and MCI / DNB inspector for accreditation. Headed the Department of Cardiology in Command Hospital Bangalore and AFMC Pune for Eight Years. Held the responsibility of Medical Advisor to all the medicine allied specialties across the 4 Southern states  	National proctor for several Interventional procedures like – TAVI, Rotational Atherectomy, intravascular Imaging, coronary physiology, CRT Device Implantation, Leadless Pacemaker Implantation, Bifurcation Angioplasty, Left Main Angioplasty, Device closure and endovascular interventions.    o	Performed 10,000 plus Coronary and non- coronary Intervention Procedures.   o	Performed close to 400 Rotational Atherectomy procedures over the past 5 Years.  o	Performed complex Peripheral Interventions including carotid, BTK in various centers  o	Extensive work on PCI optimization modalities like coronary imaging & Physiology (OCT, IVUS & FFR) for improved patient outcome.  o	Performed largest number of OCT procedures in India and recognized Command Hospital Bangalore as the center of excellence for the same.   o	Developed the TAVI program both in AFMC Pune and Command Hospital Bangalore. Performed the first TAVI procedure in 2016 and in a span of the past 2 Years, performed 12 TAVI procedures.  o	Took the lead in adopting to Leadless pacemaker and in the past 2 years, performed 34 Leadless Pacemaker Procedures in various centers. Also, implanted more than 100 CRT devices.   o	Specialized in Endovascular repair of Aortic Aneurysm, coarctation of Aorta and Venous Interventions. Performed close to 100 Aortic Interventions.   o	Pediatric Interventions - Performed more than 800 Interventions in Patients with Cyanotic and Acyanotic Congenital Heart Disease including closure of ASD, VSD, PDA   	Published more than 70 Papers in National and International Journals and involved as Principal Investigator in multiple International and ICMR funded clinical trials. Recipient of numerous honors and awards during career

summary: Dr Sunil Kumar S is a eminent Interventional Cardiologist in Bangalore with more than 14 years of experience. He completed his basic graduation, in 2004, from Bangalore Medical College and Research Institute, one of the premier medical institutions in India.  Following this, he completed  his post graduation (MD) in Internal Medicine, in 2008, from another equally esteemed medical institution, Madras Medical College, Chennai.  He then pursued his career interest in Cardiology by obtaining the doctorate DM (Cardiology)  from the well-known cardiology institute, Sri Jayadeva Institute of Cardiovascular Sciences and Research, Bangalore, in 2013. Having relocated to the US, in 2015 he received his Fellowship in Interventional Cardiology from The Mount Sinai Hospital, New York,  one of the top 10 cardiac institutes in the United States. He is well trained in various interventional cardiology procedures like coronary angiogram, angioplasty, Complex PCI, CTO interventions, Rota ablation, IVUS/OCT/FFR guided interventions, peripheral vascular interventions, Pacemaker/ICD/CRT implantation, Pediatric interventions like ASD/VSD/PDA device closure, structural heart procedures like Balloon mitral/pulmonary/aortic valvuloplasty and TAVI. His research experience is vast and has innumerable national and international publications to his credit.

summary: Dr. Sreekanth B. Shetty completed his MD (Internal Medicine) from the prestigious KEM Hospital and Seth GS Medical College, Mumbai with a Gold Medal in Internal Medicine in the year 2000. Thereafter, he completed his DM (Cardiology) from J.J. Hospital and Grant Medical College, Mumbai. Dr. Shetty is a well-known Interventional Cardiologist with a decade of experience in Cardiology. Before joining Sakra World Hospital, he has worked at Bhagwan Mahaveer Jain Heart Centre/VIVUS, Bangalore and Columbia Asia Referral Hospital and Fortis Hospital Cunningham Road, Bangalore. Dr. Shetty is an expert in Complex Coronary Angioplasties, Primary Angioplasty in Acute Myocardial Infarction, Acute Stroke Intervention, Permanent Pacemaker and Defibrillator Implantation, Heart Failure Device Implantation(CRT), Congenital Heart Disease Intervention like device closures and Valvuloplasties, Carotid, Renal and Peripheral Vascular Interventions and Venous Interventions like IVC Filter Placement and Venoplasties. Dr. Shetty is a strong proponent of lifestyle interventions for the prevention of Heart Disease and Stroke. He has taken several initiatives to educate the general public and medical practitioners on healthy lifestyle habits. Expeditious treatment of Heart Attacks with primary Angioplasties saves lives. Dr. Shetty works towards creating awareness regarding early recognition of heart attacks and fast-tracking access to medical care for patients with heart attacks. Dr. Shetty believes that “Evidence Based Medicine” is the best way to standardize care to achieve best outcomes. Dr. Sreekanth ’s Key Achievements: He is a proud recipient of many awards and citations from Mumbai University. Dr. Shetty is a life member of the “Cardiological Society (CSI) of India” Gold Medalist in Mumbai University for M.D. (Internal Medicine) in the year 2000. Third rank in Mumbai University for D.M. (Cardiology) in 2004 Several Citations and awards from Mumbai University as under: Dr. V. S. Palekar Prize, the year 2000. Dr. C. S. Patel Gold Medal 2000. Dr. Latif Patel Prize, 2000. Dr. R. B. Billimoria Scholarship. Dr. J. K. Mehta Scholarship. Dr. N. F. Surveyor Memorial Scholarship. Won the best presentation for “A case of stent grafting for a coronary aneurysm with acute MI” at the ACVS 2012 at Hyderabad.

summary: Dr. Naveen Chandra G S is HOD and Lead Consultant - Interventional Cardiology at Aster Whitefield Hospital. He is working in the field of Interventional Cardiology for over a decade. He has completed his MBBS from KIMS, Bangalore.  After completing of MD in KMC Manipal, he went on to do DM in Cardiology from the prestigious institute of Postgraduate Medical Education and Research, Kolkata.  He was a former Assistant professor in Cardiology at KMC Manipal. He has been trained in coronary intervention with a special interest in radial artery intervention. Dr Naveen Chandra has good experience in cardiovascular imaging as IVUS and OCT, Rotablation and FFR-guided coronary angioplasty. He also performs pacemaker/AICD/CRTD implantation and other structural interventions. He also has a keen interest in primary prevention of cardiovascular disease.  He is actively involved in research and academics and has published more than 30 publications in national and international indexed journals. He has been exploring special and newer interventions in recent years to keep up to date. He has strongly engaged himself in many community out reach programs CPR training, primary prevention, and health talks. He is also an avid runner himself, competing in many half and full marathons.    Areas of Expertise:   Femoral and radial angioplasty –Includes complex coronary intervention, bifurcation lesions, CTO, LMCA, PAMI interventions, and Rotablations.  Well-trained in cardiac imaging including IVUS, OCT, and FFR  Peripheral angioplasty (includes celiac, subclavian, iliac, femoral, and carotid) and venous interventions  Pulmonary artery catheter-directed thrombolysis and thrombectomy   Structural heart disease interventions - ASD, VSD,PDA Device closure, Mitral and pulmonary valvuloplasty,   Pacemaker implantation ( single chamber, Dual chamber, AICD,CRT, )  Aortic stent grating (thoracic and abdominal stent grafting)  Leadless pacemaker implantation

summary: Dr(Major) Jayaprasad V is an eminent Interventional cardiologist with over 20 years of experience in the field of medicine. He is an expert in complex coronary angioplasties and has special interest in emergency interventions especially in life saving Primary Angioplasties and also an expert in management of Heart failure patients. He is interested in academic and post graduate teaching too.After finishing his MBBS from Thanjavur Medical college, he joined Army and served in various administrative and first aid care positions in remote border jungles of our country. Subsequently did his MD from Command Hospital Airforce, Bangalore and DNB in Cardiology from Narayana Hrudaualaya. Before joining the prestigious Kauvery hospitals, he worked as Consultant Cardiologist in Shanmugha hospital,Salem and Manipal hospital, Bangalore

college: Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences
summary: Dr. Darshan K is a Cardiologist in Sarjapur Road, Bangalore and has an experience of 12 years in this field. Dr. Darshan K practices at Manipal Hospital in Sarjapur Road, Bangalore and Manipal Hospital in Hebbal, Bangalore. He completed MBBS from Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences in 2010,MD - Medicine from AIIMS New Delhi in 2014 and DM - Cardiology from PGIMER, Chandigarh, India in 2017

college: Madras Medical College, Chennai
college.1: R G Kar Medical College and Hospital
summary: Consultant Interventional Cardiologist practising chennai with Apollo hospitals. Key areas of specialisation include simple and complex angioplasty, chronic total occlusions, three vessel blockages eliminating need for bypass surgery, pacemakers and ICD therapy for heart failure, device closure of congenital defects in heart by needle prick end-vascular route, aortic and peripheral vessel angioplasty for claudication and  non healing ulcers and endo-vascular aneurysm repairs.

college: J.S.S Medical College, Mysore
summary: Dr. Navasundi is working as a Senior Consultant in the department of Cardiology at Apollo. He has extensive experience of several years in the field of Cardiology. Dr. Navasundi has performed over 3000 angiograms through femoral, radial and ulnar approach. He has to his credit of performing 1000 angioplasties both coronary and peripheral, PDA coil closures ASD device closures, IVC filter deployment and pace maker implantations. His area of expertise include the usage of IABP, distal protection devices, covered stents, IVC filters, thrombectomy, intravascular thrombolysis and embolectomy, distal embolisation and AICD implantation. He is a cardiologist to implant absorbable stent in private healthcare sector in the state of Karnataka. He is also the first to implant MRI compatible AICD system in the state of Karnataka and also the first to implant tapering coronary stent in the state of Karnataka.
